attributes.action: Make the UK the Green Vanguard. Sign Right Here, Right Now.
attributes.additional_details:
Make the UK the world leader in Green Technology, Green Investment, Green and Ethical Policy at all levels - National, Devolved, and Local Governments.

Sign Right Here, Right Now - to force the hand of the Government to make real changes in Green Policy, Green Investment, and Green Technology. OUR public representatives make mere promises without any true substance. We need to force their hand to use Green Investment, Technology and Policy to help the Environmental and Financial Crisis.

The rest of the world is leaving us behind. We need to Invest and once again become a world leader...for all our benefit.

Sign here and make a difference now.
